Today, we share with readers the family and love story of Wei Boquan, 63, who lives in the North hillside community of Wujiagang.   The prodigal son went back to serve his father   At about 10:00 a.m. on July 20, when reporters and social workers came to Wei Boquan's home, the father and son were watching TV in the living room, and he occasionally handed the peeled grapes to his father's mouth. From time to time, the old man showed a smile, but even when he reached his ear and spoke to him loudly, he was silent.
